mil6.1.4:1.1_2: netādiso aññatra ārambho ahosi nikkamo kilesayuddhaṁ maccusenaṁ vidhamanaṁ āhārapariggaho dukkarakārikā,
mil6.1.4:1.1_3: evarūpe parakkame kiñci assādaṁ alabhitvā tameva cittaṁ parihāpetvā evamavoca ‘na kho panāhaṁ imāya kaṭukāya
mil6.1.4:1.1_5: siyā nu kho añño maggo bodhāyā’ti,
mil6.1.4:1.1_6: tato nibbinditvā aññena maggena sabbaññutaṁ patto,
mil6.1.4:1.1_7: puna tāya paṭipadāya sāvake anusāsati samādapeti.
mil6.1.4:3.1_2: kāraṇena tathāgato yāya paṭipadāya attanā nibbinno virattarūpo,
mil6.1.4:4.1_2: taṁyeva paṭipadaṁ paṭipajjitvā bodhisatto sabbaññutaṁ patto.
mil6.1.4:4.2_0: Api ca, mahārāja, bodhisatto ativīriyaṁ karonto niravasesato āhāraṁ uparundhi.
mil6.1.4:4.4_0: So tena dubbalyena nāsakkhi sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇituṁ,
mil6.1.4:4.4_1: so mattamattaṁ kabaḷīkārāhāraṁ sevanto tāyeva paṭipadāya nacirasseva sabbaññutaṁ pāpuṇi.
mil6.1.4:4.5_0: Sāyeva, mahārāja, paṭipadā sabbesaṁ tathāgatānaṁ sabbaññutañāṇappaṭilābhāya.
mil6.1.4:5.1_0: Yathā, mahārāja, sabbesaṁ sattānaṁ āhāro upatthambho, āhārūpanissitā sabbe sattā sukhaṁ anubhavanti;
mil6.1.4:5.2_1: sāyeva paṭipadā sabbesaṁ tathāgatānaṁ sabbaññutañāṇappaṭilābhāya, neso, mahārāja,
mil6.1.4:5.2_5: yena tathāgato tasmiṁ samaye na pāpuṇi sabbaññutañāṇaṁ,
mil6.1.4:6.1_2: tena so pakkhahato vā bhaveyya pīṭhasappī vā asañcaro pathavitale.
mil6.1.4:6.2_0: Api nu kho, mahārāja, mahāpathaviyā doso atthi, yena so puriso pakkhahato ahosī”ti?
mil6.1.4:6.4_0: sadā paṭiyattā, bhante, mahāpathavī, kuto tassā doso?
mil6.1.4:6.5_0: Vāyāmasseveso doso, yena so puriso pakkhahato ahosī”ti.
mil6.1.4:6.6_4: yena tathāgato tasmiṁ samaye na pāpuṇi sabbaññutañāṇaṁ,
mil6.1.4:6.6_5: atha kho āhārūparodhasseveso doso sadā paṭiyattā yevesā paṭipadā.
mil6.1.4:7.3_4: yena tathāgato tasmiṁ samaye na pāpuṇi sabbaññutañāṇaṁ,
mil6.1.4:7.3_7: tasmā tathāgato tāyeva paṭipadāya sāvake anusāsati samādapeti, evaṁ kho, mahārāja,
